title: 2 Bed 1 Bath Unit for Rent in Shakopee, MN *Available July 1st
posting_body: ['707 3rd Avenue East, Shakopee, MN 55379 | Unit #9', 'Your Next Place is excited to partner with the owner of this property to help market 707 3rd Avenue East in Shakopee.', 'This is a clean 2 bedroom 1 bathroom located in a charming, upcoming neighborhood in Shakopee.', 'The Valley View Apartments are located in a convenient location with easy access to Hwy 169 and Cty Rd 101.', 'Shopping, grocery stores, restaurants and the Mississippi River are all within close proximity.', 'Cats $300 per pet + $20 pet rent.', "Landlord's qualifications:", "Move in requirement of first month's rent and a security deposit equal to the rent.", 'Verifiable positive and stable employment history.', 'Verifiable net monthly income of $3,200 or guarantee of lease / co-signer may be required.', 'Verifiable positive rental history and references with no unlawful detainers or evictions within the last 10 years.', 'No felonies regardless of charge type or misdemeanors related to violent crimes, theft, drug sales or distribution, prostitution, fraud, or damage to property within the last 15 years.', 'Credit score of 600+ (average of the 3 bureaus) or extra deposit / co-signer may be required.', 'Occupancy limit of 3 related 2 unrelated', 'Cats are welcome with an additional deposit of $300 and monthly pet rent of $20.', 'No smoking.', 'Home is not currently approved for assistance vouchers.', 'Applicant is responsible for verifying all information and qualifications with the landlord or property management company prior to submitting a paid application or signing a lease to rent.', 'Your Next Place works exclusively with renters as a free service that focuses on helping you find the next place to call home.', 'We do not own or manage any of the properties we work with.', 'In our goal to keep the renting process as low cost to you as possible we have clients fill out a Your Next Place application that we ask landlords to accept in lieu of charging you an application fee.', 'Before we view properties we prefer to set up a meeting to go over our application and go into more detail on how we function.', 'If interested in this property please call or respond to this ad to set up a meeting!', 'Lease Terms', '1 year', 'Details', '2 Beds / 1 Bath', 'Rent:', '$1,275', '/month', '700 square feet', 'Pets Allowed: Cats', 'Amenities', 'Air Conditioning', 'On Site Laundry', 'Contact', 'Your Next Place, Your Next Place', 'show contact info']
